description: This Python source file defines FastAPI routes and handlers for Atlassian OAuth 2.0 (with PKCE and legacy flows), including login initiation, callback handling, token refresh, resource listing, and configuration diagnostics. It is part of a larger system integrating Atlassian services with a web application.

classes.name: SessionData
classes.description: Data structure for maintaining OAuth session information, including state, code verifier, and tokens.

methods.name: jira_get_oauth_url(state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Generates and returns the Atlassian OAuth authorization URL for Jira as JSON.

methods.name: jira_login_alias(request: Request, state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None, return_url: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Provides an alias endpoint that redirects to the main OAuth URL, preserving params.

methods.name: None _set_session_cookie(resp: Response, session_id: str)
methods.description: Sets session cookie 'sid' with proper security attributes.

methods.name: atlassian_login(request: Request, state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Initiates Atlassian OAuth with PKCE, generates session, and redirects to Atlassian auth endpoint.

methods.name: jira_login_legacy(state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Legacy OAuth login flow for Jira using client secret, redirects to Atlassian auth endpoint.

methods.name: oauth_start(request: Request)
methods.description: Shim endpoint that redirects legacy OAuth start requests to new endpoint, preserving return URL.

methods.name: list_routes(request: Request)
methods.description: Lists all registered FastAPI routes for diagnostics.

methods.name: atlassian_callback(request: Request, code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Handles OAuth callback from Atlassian, exchanges code for tokens, and redirects to frontend.

methods.name: atlassian_refresh(request: Request)
methods.description: Uses stored refresh_token to obtain a new access_token and updates session.

methods.name: list_accessible_resources(request: Request)
methods.description: Calls Atlassian API to list accessible cloud resources using stored access_token.

methods.name: jira_callback_legacy(request: Request, code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Handles legacy Jira OAuth callback, exchanges code for tokens, and redirects back.

methods.name: get_effective_config()
methods.description: Returns effective configuration settings for diagnostics, excluding secrets.

ctags.name: atlassian_callback
ctags.pattern: /^async def atlassian_callback(request: Request, code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] /
ctags.signature: (request: Request, code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)

ctags.name: atlassian_login
ctags.pattern: /^async def atlassian_login(request: Request, state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = /
ctags.signature: (request: Request, state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None)

ctags.name: jira_callback_legacy
ctags.pattern: /^async def jira_callback_legacy(request: Request, code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str/
ctags.signature: (request: Request, code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)

ctags.name: jira_get_oauth_url
ctags.pattern: /^async def jira_get_oauth_url(state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None):$/

ctags.name: jira_login_alias
ctags.pattern: /^async def jira_login_alias(request: Request, state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] =/
ctags.signature: (request: Request, state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None, return_url: Optional[str] = None)

ctags.name: jira_login_legacy
ctags.pattern: /^async def jira_login_legacy(state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None):$/
